name: Final Fantasy XVI (itch)
description:
So like, a few years ago I made this game for school in a week.. I got a worse grade, cuz it wasn't "proffesional enough" lmao. When the line "iiits cl cu :)" line came, he looked at me like wtf is wrong with you. It was great. So a few months later, this german guy came in class to see if he wanted to be an exchange student. He asked us for a game we made. I grabbed my phone, and let him play a mobile version I made (this is PC btw). He left in silence. So yeah, this game is the best game ever made.

This game is filled with copyright and NSFW shit. That's kinda the joke, I hope you'll like it.

Plot (NSFW warning):

Adolf and Willem were talking about chicken tits when they realized you make dolphin cheese, so they made a 1000000000 dollar rich company called double d (not to confuse with dubbel d). But the dolphin leader died and the new one declared a war against humanity. Can Adolf kill the new dolphin leader: "Flippy", if that's even his real name. I mean, with a plot with so many cliche's, you can probably already tell what he really is.
